Header.title: Alltrasound for All
Header.paragraph: Providing general, vascular, and OB/GYN ultrasound exams.   We do it ALL.

About.paragraph: ALLtrasound provides fast, convenient, affordable mobile ultrasound exams for medical offices and the public.  Our multiple licensed sonographers can be scheduled within (24) hours to conduct on-site scans at your location.

Services.name: General Ultrasound Exams
Services.text: General ultrasound exam study abdominal organs which mostly include liver, gallbladder, pancrease, kidneys, spleen, etc. This exam is usually ordered due to patient have stomach pain, feeling nausea and vomiting, or back pain.

Services.name: Vascular Ultrasound Exams
Services.text: vascular exams include carotid exam on the neck, both legs of veins and /or arteries.  These exams usually ordered by doctors due to patient had a stroke or dissiness, both legs or arms feel pain, swelling, numbness, etc

Services.name: Obstetric/GYN Ultrasound Exams
Services.text: Obstetric (OB) exams provides pregnancy information about the fetus.  It includes first, second, third trimester exams.  Each one is different with baby growth and well-being.  Both patient and doctors can order this exam if they have a concern about the baby.  GYN exams concerntrate on female organs: uterus and overies

Services.name: Small Parts Ultrasound Exams
Services.text: Small parts study includes thyroid on the lower neck and male testicular study which is located in the scrotum between the legs.  Most time, doctors order thyroid study due to your abnormal blood work or felt a lump on your neck.  Testicular study usually is ordered due to pain and swelling in the testicle or felt something in the scrotum.
